title: AiTermNeutralList
description: A list of terms extracted from text, with each term converted to its neutral grammatical form

terms.description: A list of terms extracted from the text, converted to their neutral grammatical forms

sourceLanguage.description: The original language of the word in a BCP 47 format

neutralForm.description: The word in a neutral grammatical form of the original language (e.g., infinitive for verbs, singular for nouns)
